problem.markdown: A reversible 2T heat engine works between 1200 K and 600 K. Its work output per cycle is 100 J. What is amount of heat rejected (in joule per cycle), to the revervoir at 600 K? = 100 +- 1 [explanation] The efficiency is (1200-600)/1200 = 0.5. Hence, heat absorbed is 100 J/0.5 = 200 J, and heat rejected is 200 J – 100 J = 100 J. [explanation]
